SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.mcp.factory

Class ToolFactory

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mcp.factory.ToolFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
MCPAnnotatedToolFactory
public abstract class ToolFactory extends Object implements IFactory
Factory for contributing a single MCP tool See MCPAnnotatedToolFactory for a convenience way to create multiple tools in a file using annotations
